The state's youth policy is that the Azerbaijani youth is knowledgeable, educated, homeland (cont) http://t.co/kkRISqU6
The growth of young people in the spirit of patriotism is also of great importance.
I am glad that the youth of Azerbaijan in general are bound to their homeland, the Homeland lives with love, and these trends should pass from generation to generation.
For the sake of thorough preparation of young people, knowledge must first play its part. Every young (cont) http://t.co/zmDs7Kds
I also look forward to working with young people in public life. Young people are always the most active members of society.
The social processes in our country are in a very positive direction. Young people also have these processes (cont) http://t.co/2TO2cLle
I am very glad that our young people play a part in the comprehensive development of our country.
Young people are patriotic, dependent on their homeland, educated in national spirit, and in the future, our country (cont) http://t.co/xOUY5Nz6
Young people should also contribute to strengthening the ideological foundations of our state.
I see it, I welcome it and try to make young people move forward. This process is already going fast.
